translation.en: MAN 1: Fire! MAN 2: Stand back!
translation.ja: 退却だ

translation.en: Everyone go into the woods!
translation.ja: 全員 森の中へ

translation.en: MAN: Fire!
translation.ja: 撃て 退却しろ

translation.en: You okay? Come on, Bob. Bring him over that way.
translation.ja: 大丈夫ですか？ ボブ　彼をこっちへ

translation.en: Captain, you all right? Get down!
translation.ja: しっかり 伏せろ

translation.en: Gatling! They got a Gatling! Goddamn it, Cole!
translation.ja: ガトリング砲だ 気をつけろ チクショウ

translation.en: This stopped being fun about two years ago!
translation.ja: この銃にゃ うんざりだ

translation.en: MAN: Move that wagon!
translation.ja: 荷車をどかせ

translation.en: Stand clear! Get down!
translation.ja: 離れろ 伏せろ

translation.en: Fire!
translation.ja: 撃て

translation.en: Cole, Bob, you boys okay? Yeah.
translation.ja: 無事か？ ヤンガー兄弟は不死身です

translation.en: Take more than a cannon to kill the younger brothers, sir!
translation.ja: ヤンガー兄弟は不死身です

translation.en: I think the cannon's doing a pretty good job, Cole!
translation.ja: 大砲は手ごわいぞ　兄貴

translation.en: Some Indian tracker you turned out to be, Tom.
translation.ja: トム　お前が追跡したのか

translation.en: You paid me to find your bluecoats. There they are.
translation.ja: 北軍を捜せと言っただろ

translation.en: Get me the James boy. You want Jesse?
translation.ja: ジェームズを ジェシー？

translation.en: No, not Jesse. I want the one that can shoot.
translation.ja: いや 狙撃の名手のほうだ

translation.en: Frank! Frank!
translation.ja: フランク！

translation.en: MAN: Hold your ground! Frank, up front!
translation.ja: 持ち場を守れ フランク　前へ

translation.en: Jesse, watch your back!
translation.ja: ジェシー　気をつけろ

translation.en: Cannon or Gatling? MAN: Fire!
translation.ja: どっちを撃つ？ 撃て

translation.en: Cannon! Cannons.
translation.ja: 大砲だ 大砲だな

translation.en: Where you been, buddy? What's goin' on?
translation.ja: 来たか 状況は？

translation.en: Well, nothin' really.
translation.ja: 大したことない

translation.en: Every time I put my head up to hit that Gatling,
translation.ja: ガトリング砲を撃てない

translation.en: they try and shoot it off. We got a plan?
translation.ja: ガトリング砲を撃てない 作戦は？

translation.en: Yeah, my plan of lying here pissin' myself seems to be workin' mighty fine! Thank you!
translation.ja: 今のところ 隠れてビビってるだけだ

translation.en: Listen, I can hit those boys from here. We just need a distraction.
translation.ja: 奴らの気をそらせば撃てる

translation.en: A distraction?
translation.ja: 気をそらす？

translation.en: Why the hell didn't you just say so?
translation.ja: それを早く言えよ

translation.en: He's smilin'. That's never a good thing.
translation.ja: 笑ってた 何か しでかすぞ

translation.en: Get that rider!
translation.ja: あいつを狙え

translation.en: We're comin', Jesse!
translation.ja: 待ってろ　ジェシー

translation.en: MAN: Head out!
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: Take the hill! Charge!
translation.ja: 丘を狙え　突撃だ

translation.en: Fall back!
translation.ja: 退却だ

translation.en: Go!
translation.ja: こっちだ

translation.en: Go on, git. Git!
translation.ja: 失せろ 行け

translation.en: Go on! Go on!
translation.ja: やったぞ　勝利だ

translation.en: Distracting enough for you? They hardly even noticed you.
translation.ja: 十分だった？ もっと目を引けたな

translation.en: So you're saying I could've done more to attract their attention.
translation.ja: もっと目を引けたな もっと目立つ方法が？

translation.en: Uh- huh. Such as?
translation.ja: ああ 例えば？

translation.en: Well, you could've worn one of those big floppy women's Easter Sunday bonnets.
translation.ja: 女物の派手な帽子を かぶれよ

translation.en: Yeah, that would've made an impression.
translation.ja: そりゃいい そうだろ

translation.en: See, that's your problem, Frank.
translation.ja: それが兄貴の問題だ

translation.en: By the time you finish figurin' out stuff, well, I'm already finished doin' it.'
translation.ja: 兄貴が思いつく前に 俺が終わらせる

translation.en: No, Jesse, see, your problem is you're always doin' stuff before I'm finished figuring it out.
translation.ja: 俺が結論を出す前に お前が先走るんだ

translation.en: Ooh, goddamn, boy!
translation.ja: よくやった

translation.en: Wait till we get back to Missouri.
translation.ja: ミズーリに帰ったら

translation.en: Tell all them little gals 'bout how little Jesse James here charged the whole Union army by hisself.
translation.ja: お前が北軍を破った話を 女たちにしてやる

translation.en: Hey, Cole, he keeps that up, he's liable to outrank you soon.
translation.ja: コール 階級を抜かれるぞ

translation.en: Well, but I'll still be better- looking, won't I?
translation.ja: 顔では俺に勝てないだろ

translation.en: MALCOLM: Let's meet on that road over to the South!
translation.ja: 南へ向かう道で会おう

translation.en: See if we can't get those Yankees Jesse here scared off.
translation.ja: 逃げた北軍兵を追跡する

translation.en: Ride with me, cousin. I could use the walk.
translation.ja: 乗れよ 歩くよ

translation.en: All right. Suit yourself. We'll have some horses
translation.ja: そうか 道に馬を用意してる

translation.en: waitin' for you at the road. Fine.
translation.ja: そうか 道に馬を用意してる ああ

translation.en: All right, rangers. Let's ride!
translation.ja: ゲリラ隊　行くぞ！

translation.en: Now, I would sound just stupid saying something like that.
translation.ja: 俺が号令を掛けると サマにならない

translation.en: Where you boys going? There's Yankees back there.
translation.ja: 行き先は？ あっちに敵が大勢いる

translation.en: Lots of 'em. The war's over, son.
translation.ja: あっちに敵が大勢いる 戦争は終わった

translation.en: General Lee surrendered yesterday at Appomattox.
translation.ja: 昨日 リー将軍が降伏した

translation.en: Yesterday.
translation.ja: 昨日か

translation.en: Well, somebody better go tell the damn Yankees.
translation.ja: 誰か北軍に教えてやれ

translation.en: What do you reckon, cousin?
translation.ja: どうする？

translation.en: Home. Cole, we go home.
translation.ja: 帰郷だ 馬を飛ばして故郷へ帰ろう

translation.en: And we ride like hell to get there.
translation.ja: 馬を飛ばして故郷へ帰ろう

translation.en: God help any fool who tries to come between me and my farm again.
translation.ja: もう俺と農場を 引き裂かせない

translation.en: Now, that's the best damn plan I heard all war.
translation.ja: 戦争が始まって以来 最高の計画だ

translation.en: Well, boys, let's ride!
translation.ja: よし　出発するぞ

translation.en: Hello, Liberty, Missouri.
translation.ja: 帰ったぜ　リバティ

translation.en: Let's go home, back to our farms.
translation.ja: 俺たちの農園に帰ろう

translation.en: Plantin' corn, harvestin' corn and eatin' corn.
translation.ja: トウモロコシを植え 収穫して食べようぜ

translation.en: Corn gonna shoot at me? No.
translation.ja: 作物は撃ってこない そうだ

translation.en: Then I love it. Let's go.
translation.ja: 最高だ 行こう

translation.en: We got problems.
translation.ja: あれを見ろ

translation.en: FRANK: Got a garrison in town.
translation.ja: 駐屯軍がいる

translation.en: We're in occupied territory, boys.
translation.ja: 占領地になったのか

translation.en: Hands off your hip, Cole.
translation.ja: やめとけ　コール

translation.en: You ain't scared, are you, Jesse?
translation.ja: ビビってる？

translation.en: Pick your fights, cousin. You taught me that.
translation.ja: 今は俺たちが不利だ

translation.en: Jesus, mercy.
translation.ja: なんてこった

translation.en: That's Charlie Higgins.
translation.ja: ヒギンズだ

translation.en: I'm cuttin' him down. Not now, Cole.
translation.ja: 下ろそう 今はやめろ

translation.en: What in the hell is wrong with you?
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: In case we have to kill these son of a bitches I don't want 'em to see us comin'.
translation.ja: 顔を知られたら 奴らを襲撃しにくくなる

translation.en: I want to get back to the farm and make sure little Jim and the girls are okay.
translation.ja: ジムたちの無事を確認したい

translation.en: Yeah, and stop by our spread after that and tell our ma we're all right. We'll go see Doc Mimms.
translation.ja: お袋に無事を知らせてくれ 俺たちはミムス家へ

translation.en: Excuse me, sir. We're here for the doctor.
translation.ja: ミムス先生は？

translation.en: Jesse. Frank!
translation.ja: ジェシー フランクも

translation.en: Zerelda? Little Zee Mimms?
translation.ja: あのチビだったジーか？

translation.en: Well, you were little Jesse James when you left!
translation.ja: あなたもチビだった

translation.en: Yeah, but you got big.
translation.ja: デカくなったな

translation.en: I- I mean, Zee, you aged.
translation.ja: 年取ったってことだ

translation.en: And what I mean is, in a good way you got, you got big and older.
translation.ja: いい意味だよ　大きくなった

translation.en: Frank, will you say something please?
translation.ja: 兄貴　助けろよ

translation.en: No, you're doing just fine.
translation.ja: 伝わったさ

translation.en: Frank? Jesse? Daddy!
translation.ja: フランク ジェシー

translation.en: Where's Web?
translation.ja: ウェブは？

translation.en: He rode right into 'em, screamin' like a banshee.
translation.ja: 叫びながら敵に突撃を

translation.en: My little Web did that?
translation.ja: 私の息子が？

translation.en: He jumped his horse clear over our heads, killed a dozen Union soldiers before they knew what him 'em.
translation.ja: 馬で俺らを飛び越え 大勢の北軍兵を殺しました

translation.en: Took out the Gatling gun and the cannon all by himself.
translation.ja: 敵の大砲も破壊した

translation.en: Saved all our lives, doc.
translation.ja: 俺たちの命の恩人だ

translation.en: But none of the Liberty boys would have come home if not for Web Mimms.
translation.ja: 彼のおかげで帰郷できた

translation.en: God's honest truth. Web died fighting?
translation.ja: これは真実です 名誉ある死か

translation.en: Web died a hero.
translation.ja: 英雄でした

translation.en: Still died.
translation.ja: でも戻らない

translation.en: Look, doc, if there's anything we can do for you we want to help.
translation.ja: 何かできることがあれば 力になりたい

translation.en: Start thinking about yourselves.
translation.ja: 君たちのほうが心配だ

translation.en: Don't end up like Charlie Higgins. They found out Charlie rode with Quantrill's raiders.
translation.ja: ヒギンズは ゲリラ隊にいたことを知られ

translation.en: They arrested him. They tried him by military tribunal and they hanged him this morning.
translation.ja: 軍事裁判で有罪になり 今朝 絞首刑にされた

translation.en: Well, I thought there was a general amnesty.
translation.ja: 減刑はなし？

translation.en: For soldiers, yes. But if you rode
translation.ja: 正規兵だけだ ゲリラ兵は反逆罪で 死刑になる

translation.en: in one of the partisan bands, they'll hang you for treason.
translation.ja: ゲリラ兵は反逆罪で 死刑になる 君らは農場があるから さらに危険だ

translation.en: And you boys are in more danger because you've got a farm.
translation.ja: 君らは農場があるから さらに危険だ

translation.en: See, the railroad men come through offering to buy up land. Nobody sells.
translation.ja: 鉄道会社の農地の買収に 誰も応じず⸺

translation.en: So the army starts hanging men who own farms for treason.
translation.ja: 軍は農場主を 処刑しようとしてる

translation.en: During the war, all we thought about was coming home.
translation.ja: やっと帰郷できたんだ

translation.en: And I swore I'd kill anybody who'd try to get me off my farm again now.
translation.ja: 俺を農場から 引き離す奴は殺す

translation.en: If I have to go to war with the railroad to stay, that's fine by me.
translation.ja: ここに残るためなら 鉄道会社と戦う

translation.en: FRANK: All right, wait, look. Let's think about this.
translation.ja: 早まるな　俺に考えがある

translation.en: If we have a good story and we stick to it, we should be all right.
translation.ja: 作り話をすれば問題ない

translation.en: What story are they gonna believe, Frank?
translation.ja: どんな話を信じる？

translation.en: Hmm, you were in the Confederate army with General Hood's Texas army until, say, Sharpsburg,
translation.ja: “フッド将軍率いる テキサス軍に所属した後”

translation.en: where you were reassigned to General Stuart's cavalry until you surrendered in Tennessee.
translation.ja: “スチュアート将軍の 騎兵隊に配属された”

translation.en: That...just might work.
translation.ja: それなら信じるかもな

translation.en: DOC MIMMS: Yeah, that might just work.
translation.ja: ああ　だませる

translation.en: Now, go on and see your ma.
translation.ja: 家に帰りなさい

translation.en: She'll be glad to see her sons alive.
translation.ja: お母さんが喜ぶ

translation.en: And for her sake... stay that way.
translation.ja: 彼女のためにも身を守るんだ

translation.en: Zee.
translation.ja: ジー

translation.en: Thank you for everything.
translation.ja: どうも ありがとう

translation.en: Especially that story that you told my father.
translation.ja: 兄さんの作り話まで

translation.en: Now, look, Zee--
translation.ja: ジー　あれは…

translation.en: I'm goin' to go cry now.
translation.ja: これから泣くわ

translation.en: That Zerelda turned into a hell of a woman, eh?
translation.ja: いい女になったな

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Big and older?
translation.ja: 驚いたよ “デカくなった”？

translation.en: You can shut up now, Frank. You are a charmer.
translation.ja: 黙れって 女たらしだな

translation.en: I swear to God I will shoot you in your sleep.
translation.ja: 寝込みを襲うぞ

translation.en: Next time try fat and haggard.
translation.ja: 次は“太った”と言えよ

translation.en: Boys? My boys!
translation.ja: お前たち 戻ったのね

translation.en: My boys! My boys are alive!
translation.ja: ２人とも無事に帰ってきた

translation.en: Oh, God! Praise God! You're alive!
translation.ja: よかった　神に感謝しなきゃ

translation.en: Well, not if you don't ease up a bit, Ma.
translation.ja: きつく抱きしめすぎだ

translation.en: Oh! Oh, Ma.
translation.ja: お袋

translation.en: Did you kill Yankees? A fair number, Ma.
translation.ja: 敵を殺した？ かなりね

translation.en: And did you say your prayers? Every night, Ma.
translation.ja: お祈りは？ 毎晩ね

translation.en: Good. Oh, now, come on inside and wash your hands for dinner.
translation.ja: よかった さあ　食事にしましょう

translation.en: Oh, and you look so good. Oh! You look great!
translation.ja: 元気そうだ 安心した

translation.en: MA: Oh, come on. FRANK: Whoo!
translation.ja: 入って

translation.en: Howdy, boys. Look at Jimmy Younger, all grown up.
translation.ja: ただいま ジム　成長したな

translation.en: How ya doin'? All right.
translation.ja: 元気だったか？ まあね

translation.en: Your ma wouldn't let us leave until we ate somethin'.
translation.ja: 帰してくれないんだ ２時間前からな

translation.en: That was about two hours ago. I don't see clean plates.
translation.ja: ２時間前からな もっと食べなさい

translation.en: Ma, glad to see you being so nice to our Indian friend.
translation.ja: 先住民の彼も招待を？

translation.en: MA: Ah, he's a good Christian, and he killed Yankees.
translation.ja: キリスト教徒だし味方よ

translation.en: And Jesus told me that made him an all right boy.
translation.ja: それに神様が いい子だと言ってた

translation.en: Well, she's still talkin' to Jesus.
translation.ja: 神に話しかけてる

translation.en: You know, what worries me is that Jesus is talkin' back.
translation.ja: 会話してるつもりだ

translation.en: I heard that.
translation.ja: 聞こえたよ

translation.en: JESSE: Come on, Frank.
translation.ja: 声がデカいぞ

translation.en: FRANK: You play me that eight.
translation.ja: 俺のせいかよ

translation.en: You ever-- Ever notice Zerelda's eyes?
translation.ja: ジーの目は特別だな

translation.en: Yeah! Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ ２つあるからな

translation.en: She got two of 'em, don't she?
translation.ja: ２つあるからな

translation.en: I think one of them's glass. Yeah, which one is that?
translation.ja: １つはガラスだ 右目と左目 どっちが？

translation.en: Is that the right one or the left one?
translation.ja: 右目と左目 どっちが？

translation.en: The brown one. Hey!
translation.ja: 茶色のほう おい

translation.en: Cole, don't make me tell the whole town
translation.ja: コール 男と寝たことを 街中に言いふらすぞ

translation.en: about that time you screwed that fella in Atlanta.
translation.ja: 男と寝たことを 街中に言いふらすぞ

translation.en: Ooh. You talkin' to me?
translation.ja: 俺が？

translation.en: You mean that dance hall girl at Bunny's?
translation.ja: 踊り子のこと？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Sadie was a beautiful woman. Sadie was not a man.
translation.ja: セイディは女だ　男じゃない

translation.en: She had a mustache. Nice mustache.
translation.ja: ひげがあった

translation.en: She had more than a mustache.
translation.ja: 他のものも

translation.en: Well, she- she was European.
translation.ja: ヨーロッパの女だ

translation.en: Ah, all right, I'll admit Sadie was a woman if you just stop sayin' things about my Zee.
translation.ja: 俺のジーのことで茶化すのを やめたら女と認める

translation.en: My Zee? Your Zee?
translation.ja: “俺の”？ お前の？

translation.en: Yeah. Oh.
translation.ja: そうだ “女の目には 真の プロメテウスの炎が⸺”

translation.en: From women's eyes, this doctrine I derive.
translation.ja: “女の目には 真の プロメテウスの炎が⸺”

translation.en: They sparkle still, the right Promethean fire.
translation.ja: “女の目には 真の プロメテウスの炎が⸺” “燃え続けている”

translation.en: They are the books, the arts, the academes..
translation.ja: “その目は 芸術であり学問であり⸺”

translation.en: ...that show, contain and nourish all the world.
translation.ja: “その目は 芸術であり学問であり⸺” “世界を豊かにする”

translation.en: Well, I don't know what it is you just said, but it sounded real nice.
translation.ja: よく分からないが いい言葉だ

translation.en: That's Shakespeare. Now, he's European.
translation.ja: シェイクスピアも ヨーロッパ人だ

translation.en: Wanna write that down for me, Frank? So I can say it to Zee?
translation.ja: 今のをジーに言いたい

translation.en: Yeah, I'll send you a telegram.
translation.ja: 書いてやるよ

translation.en: Thanks, brother.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Thanks for the help, Cole.
translation.ja: 助かったよ

translation.en: Well, you did plenty over at our place.
translation.ja: 困った時は お互い様だ

translation.en: You miss it, don't you?
translation.ja: 恋しいか？

translation.en: JESSE: The war? COLE: Yeah.
translation.ja: 戦争が？

translation.en: Hell, no.
translation.ja: まさか

translation.en: There are things I miss about it, but...
translation.ja: いいことも あったが…

translation.en: You know, it was exciting. Yeah.
translation.ja: 刺激的だった でも大勢が死んだ なぜそんなことを？

translation.en: But it was a whole lot of killing and why should we miss that?
translation.ja: でも大勢が死んだ なぜそんなことを？

translation.en: COLE: Well, 'cause we were good at it. Shoot, we were great at it.
translation.ja: 俺たちは 戦場で無敵だっただろ

translation.en: If you tell anybody I said this, I have to kill you 'cause everybody knows that I'm the toughest man in this town.
translation.ja: 俺の格が落ちるから 今から言うことは秘密だぞ

translation.en: But you are one terrifying son of a bitch with them guns.
translation.ja: 銃を持たせりゃ お前は最強だ

translation.en: Yeah, well...
translation.ja: だとしても…

translation.en: Boys.
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: Howdy, folks. How are you today?
translation.ja: ご機嫌いかが？

translation.en: Howdy. Yeah, easterners.
translation.ja: どうも 東部人か

translation.en: We're just fine, thank you, sir.
translation.ja: 結構よ　どうも

translation.en: I'm Rollin H. Parker.
translation.ja: 私はパーカー

translation.en: Personal emissary to Mr. Thaddeus Rains, president of the Rock Northern Railroad.
translation.ja: ロック･ノーザン鉄道の社長 レインズ氏の使者です

translation.en: And this gentleman is the famous Allan Pinkerton.
translation.ja: 彼はアラン･ピンカートン

translation.en: Founder of the Secret Service and currently under contract to Mr. Thaddeus Rains.
translation.ja: 探偵社の創設者で レインズ氏と契約しています

translation.en: As you no doubt heard from your neighbors
translation.ja: 我々の鉄道は西へ延びてます

translation.en: our railroad is moving West. That makes sense 'cause,
translation.ja: 我々の鉄道は西へ延びてます 東へ延びたら海に落ちるだろ

translation.en: see, East would put you underwater.
translation.ja: 東へ延びたら海に落ちるだろ

translation.en: Moving West opened up the frontier to folks such as yourselves.
translation.ja: 西部の人々に 新天地が開けます

translation.en: It just so happens that your acreage here is located on the proposed right of way.
translation.ja: ただ この土地は 敷設予定地のため

translation.en: I am here... to get your signature on this land sale contract.
translation.ja: 土地売買契約書に サインをもらいに来たんです

translation.en: And I'm authorized to pay you $2 an acre.
translation.ja: １エーカーあたり ２ドルで買います

translation.en: Two dollars? PARKER: That's right.
translation.ja: ２ドル？ ええ

translation.en: That's the price approved by the Department of the Interior of the Government of the United States of America.
translation.ja: 米国内務省により 承認された価格です

translation.en: This land ain't for sale.
translation.ja: この土地は売らない

translation.en: Ma'am, I can understand how you feel.
translation.ja: ご婦人 家を守りたいのは分かるが これは決定事項です

translation.en: You've made a lovely home here, but it really isn't up to me or you.

translation.en: He ain't bad at it. Yeah?
translation.ja: 悪くない 本当？

translation.en: It's tougher than it looks. Yeah!
translation.ja: 苦労してる まあな

translation.en: Where'd you get these riders?
translation.ja: どこで仲間を？

translation.en: Well, we didn't. Zerelda did.
translation.ja: ジーが集めたんだ

translation.en: Turns out your wife makes a hell of an outlaw.
translation.ja: 彼女も無法者だな

translation.en: BOB: So, what's the plan, Jesse?
translation.ja: 今後の計画は？

translation.en: Well, Bob, I think my wife and I are gonna go and buy a farm.
translation.ja: 農場を買おうと思ってる

translation.en: A farm? Down in Tennessee.
translation.ja: 農場？ テネシーにな

translation.en: Hmm. All right.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: You, uh, you wanna maybe, ride with the Younger Gang for a while before you do that?
translation.ja: その前にヤンガー団と ひと仕事どうだ？

translation.en: Bye, boys.
translation.ja: 行くよ

translation.en: Tom.
translation.ja: トム

translation.en: FRANK: Tennessee, huh?
translation.ja: テネシーか

translation.en: Yeah, I think so.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: I'll meet you there in a couple weeks.
translation.ja: 数週間後に行く

translation.en: I'll see you soon.
translation.ja: 待ってる

translation.en: And, uh...thanks for that distraction back there.
translation.ja: 敵の気をそらしてくれて ありがとう

translation.en: Hell, they hardly even noticed us.
translation.ja: もっと目を引けたな

translation.en: Mrs. James? Shall we?
translation.ja: 出発するか ええ

translation.en: Shall we, indeed. Frank. Rangers.
translation.ja: じゃあな　兄貴 みんなも

translation.en: Tennessee? I'll explain on the way.
translation.ja: テネシー？ 後で説明する

translation.en: All right, boys.
translation.ja: よし　みんな

translation.en: Let's ride! Hah!
translation.ja: 行くぞ！

translation.en: When were you plannin' on tellin' me?
translation.ja: なぜ黙ってたの？

translation.en: I just did. Only because I asked?
translation.ja: 今話した 聞いたから？

translation.en: Damn! Am I ever gonna win with you?
translation.ja: 君には勝てない

translation.en: Don't change the subject.
translation.ja: ごまかさないで
